data.text: @WeAllGrowLatina Thank you for demanding visibility for us 👏🏽
@MujerProblema @WeAllGrowLatina @lady_strombetta @bustle @Cosmopolitan @ryanroschke @POPSUGAR @goldenglobes Yes it is! It's actually late, but we've got this!!!

@MujerProblema @lady_strombetta @bustle @Cosmopolitan @ryanroschke @POPSUGAR @goldenglobes Dear @Bustle, @Cosmopolitan, and @Popsugar please consider amending your lists to include some of the amazing Latinx authors you missed. To make it easy for you, we put together this cheat sheet: https://t.co/3Nmiekudev

@MujerProblema @lady_strombetta @bustle @Cosmopolitan @ryanroschke @POPSUGAR @goldenglobes The thing is, Latinas don't just exist. We're kicking ass. And if your knee-jerk response to why there aren't Latinas on these lists is to think we must not have written anything worth including, you are wrong. 🤦🏻‍♀️

@WeAllGrowLatina @lady_strombetta @bustle @Cosmopolitan @ryanroschke @POPSUGAR @goldenglobes There's room for all of us. And if any list is claiming to represent the best of a given year, genre, or art form, it needs to actually be representative of the best. FYI the best includes women, women of color, AND Latinas. https://t.co/2Uj5qlZPff

@WeAllGrowLatina @lady_strombetta @bustle @Cosmopolitan @ryanroschke @POPSUGAR @goldenglobes Now before anyone points out that there are WOC on there, we say ¡basta! We're not trying to compete for the one "of color" spot or the two spots they reserve for token women authors. We want MORE women, more women of color, and more Latinas on ALL of these lists.

@WeAllGrowLatina @lady_strombetta @bustle @Cosmopolitan @ryanroschke @POPSUGAR And don't even get us started on the Golden Globes. They have one million categories and only manage to nominate Spanish actress Penelope Cruz. You can do better @GoldenGlobes! 
https://t.co/psUd6F3niq

@MujerProblema @lady_strombetta @bustle @Cosmopolitan Or this from @ryanroschke @Popsugar "10 Incredible Books From This Year That NEED to Be on Your Reading List." We'd argue Latina authors NEED to be on every list. These are the woman-focused, feminist publications that are supposed to be representing us! https://t.co/9D9Bd6uR9P

@WeAllGrowLatina @lady_strombetta @bustle Or this one from @Cosmopolitan. It's of a list of "12 feminist books you should read" and yet none of them are written by Latinas. Umm newsflash there are Latina Feminist writers (side-eye emoji)... https://t.co/CQlsnxlwQV
@MujerProblema Exactly. Just check out this list by @lady_strombetta on @BUSTLE of the 25 best nonfiction books of the year. There's not a single Latina on there. https://t.co/LJSbl9IWXX

@WeAllGrowLatina The Latinos are missing! There are over 55 million Latinos in the US but somehow our authors, actors, artists, never seem to make these lists - especially when you focus on the female-side of the equation. It's like we don't exist! https://t.co/Y7agcskdnA
